title: Yoga by the Lake
author: Government Websites by CivicPlus
cleaned_text: Join us for more Yoga by the Lake this fall! Relax and unwind on Saturday mornings at the Terra Lake Amphitheater (6300 Pioneer Pkwy). Enjoy this free hour of outdoor yoga from 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m. This year, we are partnering with IGNIT to offer each session taught by certified yoga instructor Rocio Valea. - September 2 - September 9 - September 16 - September 23 - October 7 - October 14
